title: When It Comes To Costumes, Nola's Mardi Gras Mischief Is A Year-Round Treat
teaser: Tuesday is Mardi Gras â€” but many New Orleanians don't reserve just one day to don their costumes. The city embraces the notion that every now and then, it's good to become someone you're not.
